SEARCH

Class Deluxe

java.lang.Object
Room
Deluxe
public class Deluxe extends Room
Represents a Deluxe room, which is 20% more expensive than a standard room

  • Field Summary

    Fields inherited from class Room

    isReserved, name, price

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Deluxe(String name, float price)
    Constructor for a deluxe room that uses the Room class' constructor to initialize the given name, the base price at Php 1,299, and the isReserved boolean static array with a size of 31 (corresponding to the number of days in a month).

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    setPrice(float newPrice)
    sets the base price of a room per night to a given new one and adds the deluxe modifier

    Methods inherited from class Room

    changeDayAvailability, checkIfAllReserved, checkMaxAvailable, getIsReserved, getIsReservedDay, getName, getPrice

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • Deluxe

      public Deluxe(String name, float price)
      Constructor for a deluxe room that uses the Room class' constructor to initialize the given name, the base price at Php 1,299, and the isReserved boolean static array with a size of 31 (corresponding to the number of days in a month). Also, all elements of the array are initialized to false as no rooms have been reserved at the time of creating them. The price is then modified to add 20%
      Parameters:
      name - - the unique identifier for a room following a specific naming convention
      price - - floating value for the price of the room

  • Method Details

    • setPrice

      public void setPrice(float newPrice)
      sets the base price of a room per night to a given new one and adds the deluxe modifier
      Overrides:
      setPrice in class Room
      Parameters:
      newPrice - - the new price of the room
